channel.title: [HELP] Simple Non-Coding Private $erver Question [HELP]
channel.description:
[b][right]Hiya, I need to know a question about me opening my own server. If i were to get my own IP address, and open the port witht he name, could i be able to let people into my server?
NOTE: I am using a laptop, and there is another laptop using the same internet in the house. I won't be using a router or whatever it is.
Thanks, also, do i need to open the port even if i create a no-ip on the website?
Liam[/right][/b]

item.title: [HELP] Simple Non-Coding Private $erver Question [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @desiprince desiprince
item.description:
@desiprince wrote:

no u have to port forward or ppl cant log on to ur server

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Simple Non-Coding Private $erver Question [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

if there’s 2 comps on same internet you have a router and need to portforward. and you don’t have a static ip you have a dynamic so get a no-ip

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Simple Non-Coding Private $erver Question [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @liamsford liamsford
item.description:
@liamsford wrote:

I’m asking, even if there are two laptops in the house, can i still run a server with out the portforwarding or whatever.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Simple Non-Coding Private $erver Question [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @desiprince desiprince
item.description:
@desiprince wrote:

y dont u just make a ip on www.no-ip.com

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Simple Non-Coding Private $erver Question [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @mackel mackel
item.description:
@mackel wrote:

[quote=“liamsford, post:1, topic:176023”][b][right]Hiya,
If i were to get my own IP address, and open the port with the name, could i be able to let people into my server?

NOTE: I am using a laptop, and there is another laptop using the same internet in the house. I won’t be using a router or whatever it is.

Thanks, also, do i need to open the port even if i create a no-ip on the website?

Liam[/right][/b][/quote]

If i were to get my own IP address, and open the port with the name, could i be able to let people into my server? - NOPE

do i need to open the port even if i create a no-ip on the website? - YEP

Read full topic
